author: Marc Walker
title: Dramatic video of Tesco staff tackling suspected shoplifter while shouting 'shut your f mouth'
text:
News Dramatic video of Tesco staff tackling suspected shoplifter while shouting 'shut your f mouth' The man grapples with staff before he is bundled into a store room where he is ordered to 'sit on the f floor' Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Tesco staff caught tackling suspected shoplifter Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A suspected shoplifter is allegedly manhandled and ordered by staff to 'shut your f mouth' and 'sit on the f*
